sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FaBook, FaCertificate, FaChartLine, FaCalendar } from 'react-icons/fa'; const StudentDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('courses'); // Sample course data const courses = [ { id: 1, title: 'Introduction to Web Development', progress: 75, nextLesson: 'JavaScript Basics', instructor: 'John Doe' }, { id: 2, title: 'Advanced React Patterns', progress: 30, nextLesson: 'Custom Hooks', instructor: 'Jane Smith' }, // Add more courses as needed ]; return (
{/* Navbar */}

Learning Dashboard

{localStorage.getItem('userName')}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Progress Overview */}

Active Courses

4

Completed

2

Overall Progress

68%

Hours Spent

24h

{/* Course List */}

Your Courses

{courses.map(course => (

{course.title}

Instructor: {course.instructor}

Next Lesson: {course.nextLesson}

{course.progress}% Complete
{/* Progress Bar */}
))}
); }; export default StudentDashboard;
